title: E177 Gio's Burner Phone and a Very Slow Steamship Tour
description:
Yuck... we mean congratulations! This week we're reliving the glory days of our digital child Chremmett (Chremit?) and 4am sleepover madness. Em then covers the Pittsburgh Congelier House, which may or may not be debunked but the lore is still alive in everyone's hearts. Then Christine takes us to Ventura, California with the abduction and murder of Sherri Dally. Also, is Hell a lot closer than we think?... and that's why we drink!


Please consider supporting the companies that support us!


Go to drinkworks.com for free shipping!
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Kast Media)
